Package dev.rusthero.versionchecker

Class GitHubVersionChecker

java.lang.Object
dev.rusthero.versionchecker.GitHubVersionChecker
All Implemented Interfaces:
VersionChecker
public class GitHubVersionChecker extends Object implements VersionChecker
A class that uses the GitHub API to check for the latest version of a specified repository. This class can be used to determine whether a program is running on the latest version of the repository, and to retrieve information about the latest version. This class implements VersionChecker.

  • Constructor Details

    • GitHubVersionChecker

      public GitHubVersionChecker(String owner, String repo) throws MalformedURLException
      Constructs a new instance of the GitHubVersionChecker class, which uses the GitHub API to check for the latest version of a specified repository. The constructor constructs the endpoint URL using the provided owner and repo values.
      Parameters:
      owner - The name of the owner of the repository to check.
      repo - The name of the repository to check.
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - If the constructed endpoint URL is not a valid URL.

    • GitHubVersionChecker

      public GitHubVersionChecker(String endpoint) throws MalformedURLException
      Constructs a new instance of the GitHubVersionChecker class with the specified API endpoint URL. The constructor creates a new URL object using the provided endpoint value, and sets it as the endpoint for the GitHubVersionChecker instance.
      Parameters:
      endpoint - The URL of the endpoint to use for retrieving the latest version information from the GitHub API.
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - If the constructed endpoint URL is not a valid URL.

    • GitHubVersionChecker

      public GitHubVersionChecker(URL endpoint)
      Constructs a new instance of the GitHubVersionChecker class with the specified API endpoint URL. The constructor sets the provided URL object as the endpoint for the GitHubVersionChecker instance.
      Parameters:
      endpoint - The URL object representing the endpoint to use for retrieving the latest version information from the GitHub API.

  • Method Details

    • getLatestVersion

      public Version getLatestVersion() throws RateLimitExceededException, ReleaseOrRepoNotFoundException, IOException
      Returns the latest version of the repository according to the GitHub API. This method sends an HTTP request to the GitHub API endpoint and retrieves the latest version information.
      Specified by:
      getLatestVersion in interface VersionChecker
      Returns:
      The latest version of the repository.
      Throws:
      RateLimitExceededException - Thrown to indicate that the rate limit for the GitHub API has been reached or exceeded.
      ReleaseOrRepoNotFoundException - If the specified repository or latest release is not found.
      IOException - If an error occurs while retrieving the latest version information from the API endpoint.

    • isLatestVersion

      public boolean isLatestVersion(Version version) throws RateLimitExceededException, ReleaseOrRepoNotFoundException, IOException
      Determines whether the specified version string matches the latest version of the repository according to the GitHub API. Returns true if the specified version matches the latest version, and false otherwise.
      Specified by:
      isLatestVersion in interface VersionChecker
      Parameters:
      version - The version to be compared with the latest version.
      Returns:
      True if the specified version matches the latest version, and false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RateLimitExceededException - Thrown to indicate that the rate limit for the GitHub API has been reached or exceeded.
      ReleaseOrRepoNotFoundException - If the specified repository or latest release is not found.
      IOException - If an error occurs while retrieving the latest version information from the API endpoint.

    • ifOutdatedVersion

      public void ifOutdatedVersion(Version version, Consumer<Version> latestVersionConsumer) throws ReleaseOrRepoNotFoundException, RateLimitExceededException, IOException
      Executes a provided consumer function if the specified version is outdated.
      Specified by:
      ifOutdatedVersion in interface VersionChecker
      Parameters:
      version - The version to be compared with the latest version.
      latestVersionConsumer - The consumer function to be executed if the specified version is outdated.
      Throws:
      RateLimitExceededException - Thrown to indicate that the rate limit for the GitHub API has been reached or exceeded.
      ReleaseOrRepoNotFoundException - If the specified repository or latest release is not found.
      IOException - If an error occurs while retrieving the latest version information from the API endpoint.
